paragraphs.text: Back in 2013, I had this wild idea to build an HTML block inspired by my sister's final year project. And guess what? I totally ended up getting hooked on coding!
Fast forward to now, and I've been working on some really cool projects for a finance company. Right now, I'm all about Web development.
When I'm not coding, you can find me either drawing or hanging out with my friends at the park. It's always a blast!
